explanation: [0-0] In a green valley, a woman in a pink tracksuit stands with a little girl in a blue short-sleeved shirt and pink shorts on her left. In front of them is a simple bridge made of white wooden planks.

[0-7] First, the woman in pink walks across the bridge, turns around, crouches down, and extends her hands. At the same time, the little girl also extends her hands. Suddenly, the bridge begins to break, and both of them wave their hands in panic.
